verses.text: \w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w try|strong="G1381"\w* the \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* they \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* false \w prophets|strong="G5578"\w* are gone \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w Hereby|strong="G1722"\w* know \w ye|strong="G1097"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* confesseth \w that|strong="G3670"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w confesseth|strong="G3670"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* that \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add spirit\add* of \w antichrist|strong="G0500"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it should \w come|strong="G2064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* even \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, little \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w overcome|strong="G3528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w greater|strong="G3187"\w* is \w he|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G1223"\w* speak \w they|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: he that \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*; he \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*. \w Hereby|strong="G1537"\w* know \w we|strong="G1097"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w error|strong="G4106"\w*.

\w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, let us \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

He that \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* was \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w toward|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, because \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* only \w begotten|strong="G3439"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Herein|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \add to be\add* the \w propitiation|strong="G2434"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

No \w man|strong="G3762"\w* hath \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* at any \w time|strong="G4455"\w*. \w If|strong="G1437"\w* we \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w perfected|strong="G5048"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w Hereby|strong="G1722"\w* know \w we|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w dwell|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* do \w testify|strong="G3140"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \add to be\add* the \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*. \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Herein|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G5048"\w* \w our|strong="G3326"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w casteth|strong="G0906"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w torment|strong="G2851"\w*. He that \w feareth|strong="G5399"\w* \w is|strong="G5048"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hateth|strong="G3404"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* he \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w hath|strong="G3708"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* have \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w That|strong="G2443"\w* he who \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.
